effect.Name: Photoshop Color Burn (Background)
effect.description: (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Looks at the color information in each channel and darkens the base color to reflect the blend color by increasing the contrast between the two. Blending with white produces no change
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Photoshop Color Burn (Background) Shader | 1.2 (30.06.2024) */
parameter.description: (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Looks at the color information in each channel and darkens the base color to reflect the blend color by increasing the contrast between the two. Blending with white produces no change

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable manages which color will be the divider. When this value is set to 0 then blend will divide base and when set to 1 then base will divide blend.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.
